name: Interview Scorecard
description: Evaluate candidate interviews with structured scoring

criteria.name: Technical Skills
criteria.question: Does candidate have required technical skills?

criteria.name: Relevant Experience
criteria.question: Is their experience relevant to the role?

criteria.name: Communication
criteria.question: How well do they communicate complex ideas?

criteria.name: Culture Fit
criteria.question: Do they align with company values and culture?

criteria.name: Motivation
criteria.question: Are they genuinely interested and motivated?

criteria.name: Red Flags
criteria.question: Were there any concerning patterns or inconsistencies?

extraction_targets.prompt: Brief summary of the candidate's background
Assess their technical skills and knowledge
How relevant is their experience to this role?
What concerns or gaps were identified?
What questions did the candidate ask? What does this reveal?
Notice period, salary expectations, start date availability

system_prompt:
You are an HR analyst creating a structured interview scorecard. Evaluate the candidate objectively based on what was discussed.

Use the STAR method (Situation, Task, Action, Result) to assess behavioral answers. Flag any inconsistencies or concerns.

Be fair and evidence-based. Output valid JSON.
